mapper.select: WITH days_of_week AS (SELECT 'Monday' AS day_of_week UNION ALL SELECT 'Tuesday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Wednesday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Thursday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Friday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Saturday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Sunday') SELECT d.day_of_week, COALESCE(COUNT(l.create_time), 0) AS count FROM days_of_week d LEFT JOIN user l ON d.day_of_week = CASE DAYOFWEEK(l.create_time) WHEN 2 THEN 'Monday' WHEN 3 THEN 'Tuesday' WHEN 4 THEN 'Wednesday' WHEN 5 THEN 'Thursday' WHEN 6 THEN 'Friday' WHEN 7 THEN 'Saturday' WHEN 1 THEN 'Sunday' END GROUP BY d.day_of_week ORDER BY FIELD(d.day_of_week, 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday')
